templates.template: - $IF($EQUALS(@@[Type]@@,#View),#@@iconViewFormat@@{.viewIcon title="View Format"},#$IF($EQUALS(@@[Type]@@,#Column),#@@iconColumnFormat@@{.columnIcon title="Column Format"},#@@iconFormFormat@@{.formIcon title="Form Format"})) [@@[Title]@@](@@[Link]@@){target=_blank title="@@[Name]@@ (@@[Type]@@): $REPLACE(@@[Description]@@,#`,#)" data-screenshot="@@[ScreenshotUrl]@@"}

file.name: columnsamples
file.section:
# List of Column Formatting Samples
This is an alphabetical list of all the **column formatting** samples available. Each sample has a dedicated readme file to explain setup instructions and demonstrated capability.
!!! Tip Depending on what you are looking for, you may find the sample [groupings](./groupings/columntype.md) more helpful.

file.name: formsamples
file.section:
# List of Form Formatting Samples
This is an alphabetical list of all the **form formatting** samples available. Each sample has a dedicated readme file to explain setup instructions and demonstrated capability.
!!! Tip Depending on what you are looking for, you may find the sample [groupings](./groupings/operator.md) more helpful.

file.name: viewsamples
file.section:
# List of View Formatting Samples
This is an alphabetical list of all the **view formatting** samples available. Each sample has a dedicated readme file to explain setup instructions and demonstrated capability.
!!! Tip Depending on what you are looking for, you may find the sample [groupings](./groupings/category.md) more helpful.

file.name: action
file.section:
#Samples by Action
Samples are grouped by their usage of `customRowAction` `action` properties. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: author
file.section:
#Samples by Author
Samples are grouped by their creator. Samples with multiple authors will be listed under each. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: category
file.section:
# Samples by Category
Samples are grouped by topic or approach. This is not an exhaustive list.

file.name: columntype
file.section:
# Samples by Column Type
Samples are grouped by the column type they are applied to (column formats) or, in the case of view/form formats, by any columns they reference. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: feature
file.section:
# Samples by Feature
Samples are grouped by their usage of key features. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: operator
file.section:
# Samples by Operator
Samples are grouped by their usage of advanced operators. This excludes common arithmetic operators (`+`, `-`, `/`, `*`) and conditional operators (`if`, `<`, `<=`, `>`, `>=`, `==`, `!=`, `||`, `&&`). Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: SP2019
file.section:
# SharePoint 2019 Format Samples
The following samples provide a version that works within SharePoint 2019.

!!! Note View and Form formatting are **not** supported in SharePoint 2019 and so the above are all column format samples.
Each of the above samples contain at least 2 json files. The SharePoint 2019 files end in AST.

file.name: token
file.section:
# Samples by Placeholder Token
Samples are grouped by their usage of placeholder tokens. `@currentField` is excluded because it is used nearly everywhere. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: ms-bgColor
file.section:
# Samples by Class: ms-bgColor-*
The `ms-bgColor-*` classes apply a **background color**. Several standard, shared, theme, neutral, and more are included.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

!!! Note "Complimentary Classes" These classes compliment the [ms-borderColor-*](./ms-borderColor.md) and [ms-fontColor-*](./ms-fontColor.md) classes and except where noted below contain equivalent colors.
!!! Warning The named color `alert` does not have a `ms-bgColor-` equivalent despite being present elsewhere

file.name: ms-borderColor
file.section:
# Samples by Class: ms-borderColor-*
The `ms-borderColor-*` classes apply a **border color** (still requires a `border-width` and `border-style` to display). Several standard, shared, theme, neutral, and more are included.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

!!! Note "Complimentary Classes" These classes compliment the [ms-fontColor-*](./ms-fontColor.md) and [ms-bgColor-*](./ms-bgColor.md) classes and except where noted below contain equivalent colors.
!!! Warning The named colors `alert`, `severeWarning`, `warning`, and `error` do not have `ms-borderColor-` equivalents despite being present elsewhere

file.name: ms-fontColor
file.section:
# Samples by Class: ms-fontColor-*
The `ms-fontColor-*` classes apply a font **color**. Several standard, shared, theme, neutral, and more are included.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

!!! Note "Complimentary Classes" These classes compliment the [ms-borderColor-*](./ms-borderColor.md) and [ms-bgColor-*](./ms-bgColor.md) classes and except where noted (on those pages) contain equivalent colors.

file.name: ms-fontWeight
file.section:
# Samples by Class: ms-fontWeight-*
The `ms-fontWeight-*` classes apply various levels of **bold**.
Samples are grouped by classes used and listed from lightest to boldest. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: ms-font
file.section:
# Samples by Class: ms-font-*
The `ms-font-*` classes apply various combinations of text **size** and **font weight**. To apply just size or just weight use the [ms-fontSize-*](./ms-fontSize.md) and [ms-fontWeight-*](./ms-fontWeight.md) classes respectively.
Samples are grouped by classes used and listed from smallest to biggest. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: ms-fontSize
file.section:
# Samples by Class: ms-fontSize-*
The `ms-fontSize-*` classes apply various text **size**.
Samples are grouped by classes used and listed from smallest to biggest. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-field-fontSize
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-field-fontSize*
The `sp-field-fontSize*` classes apply various text **size**.
Samples are grouped by classes used and listed from smallest to biggest. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-List-color
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-List-color*
The `sp-List-color*` classes apply various **background-colors** that correspond to Microsoft Lists color choices (shown in their icons).
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: animation
file.section:
# Samples by Class: Animation
The `ms-motion-*` and `ms-*` classes apply various **transitions** and **timings** to apply to elements as they appear/disappear.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-css-backgroundColor
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-css-backgroundColor-*
The `sp-css-backgroundColor-*` classes apply a **background color**. Several standard, named, theme, neutral, and more are included.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-css-color
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-css-color-*
The `sp-css-color-*` classes apply a font **color**. Several standard, named, theme, neutral, and more are included.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-css-borderColor
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-css-borderColor-*
The `sp-css-borderColor-*` classes apply a **border color** (still requires a `border-width` and `border-style` to display). Several standard, named, theme, neutral, and more are included.
The `sp-css-borderColor-*` classes apply to _all_ four borders. To apply colors only to specific borders use the `sp-css-borderTopColor-*`,`sp-css-borderLeftColor-*`,`sp-css-borderBottomColor-*`, or `sp-css-borderRightColor-*` classes also listed below.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-css-border
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-css-border Other
In addition to the [`sp-css-borderColor-*`](./sp-css-borderColor.md) classes, there are a few additional border classes that apply unique colors and, in some cases, styles and widths.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-card
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-card-*
The `sp-card-*` classes are intended to be used in gallery views (but are available for other formats as well). Unlike most of the other classes, some of these only apply styles when nested together.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-row
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-row-*
The `sp-row-*` classes provide a small set of styles that make it easier to ensure your formats match the out of the box styling.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-field
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-field-*
The `sp-field-*` classes provide a variety of styles most of which were designed with list formatting in mind.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.

file.name: sp-field-border
file.section:
# Samples by Class: sp-field-border*
The `sp-field-border*` classes ending in `Regular`, `Semibold`, and `Bold` set a **border-width** to one or more sides (`1px`, `2px`, and `3px` respectively). The `sp-field-border*` classes ending in `Solid`, `Dashed`, and `Dotted` set a **border-style** to one or more sides.
Samples are grouped by classes used. Expand to see the related samples.
